pages.title: Glue
pages.text: Glue is made from heating up a dixie bucket filled with water and bones. The glue can then in turn be used as substitute for slimeballs in most cases.

pages.title: Dixie (Water+Bones)
pages.text: Before you can make the glue, you'll need to fill a dixie with bones and water. Which you'll then have to heat up over a fire to produce glue.

pages.title: Dixie
pages.text: A dixie is made from working a sheet of wrought iron on an anvil.
